'''Goatherd''' can refer to:
* [[Goatherd (The Laws of Gods and Men)]] - a goatherd from [[Meereen]] who brings the burnt bones of a goat before [[Daenerys Targaryen]].
* [[Goatherd (The Children)]] - a goatherd from [[Meereen]] who brings the burnt bones of [[Zalla|his daughter]] before [[Daenerys Targaryen]].
